title: AI tool detects hidden warning signs of disease by analyzing genetic building blocks within cells
description: McGill University researchers have developed an artificial intelligence tool that can detect previously invisible disease markers inside single cells.
content:

title: New AI enhances the view inside fusion energy systems
description: Imagine watching a favorite movie when suddenly the sound stops. The data representing the audio is missing. All that's left are images. What if artificial intelligence (AI) could analyze each frame of the video and provide the audio automatically based on the pictures, reading lips and noting each time a foot hits the ground?
